description:
User Interface to install packages from most common CLI package managers such as Winget, Scoop, Chocolatey, Pip, Npm, .NET Tool and PowerShell Gallery.

The main goal of this project is to give a GUI Store to the most common CLI Package Managers for windows, such as Winget, Scoop, Chocolatey, Pip, Npm, .
NET Tool and PowerShell Gallery.
This app allows you to install, remove and maintain up-to-date the packages published on Winget, Scoop, Chocolatey, Pip, Npm, .
NET Tool and PowerShell Gallery.
Changelog
- Fix an issue where the UniGetUI.exe and all UniGetUI.*.dll files wouldn't be timestamped, and their certificates would expire
- Minor improvements to WinGet troubleshooter
- WinGet will now detect UniGetUI as an installed app
